ENGLISH: Lobs special stun shells that can temporarily stun Galatean aliens. Requires Tower Ammunition Factory to operate.
Fires barrage of plasmoids on target. Uses substantial amount of power.
Advances in ballistics and metallurgy allow creation of new artillery towers.
Improved mechanisms and assemblies extend effectiveness of advanced artillery towers.
Further development of artillery warheads and propellants enable higher damage output.
A rotary cannon that fires fragmentation shells in short bursts. Requires Tower Ammunition Factory to operate.
Variant of Sentinel Tower that uses a shotgun. Effective against swarms. Requires Tower Ammunition Factory to operate.
A tower equipped with large calibre cannon that can engage distant targets. Requires Tower Ammunition Factory to operate.
Development of novel propellants and compact assemblies allow creation of high caliber towers.
Refinement of ammunition assemblies and handling enable increased effectiveness.
Improved ballistics and metallurgy allow higher stopping potential.
Fires mini-singularity shells at distant targets. Requires Tower Ammunition Factory to operate.
Fires singularity shells at distant targets. Requires superheated plasma and Tower Ammunition Factory to operate.
Research into ferdonite and advanced propulsions enable creation of towers that shoot singularity shells.
Redesigned gravity implosion cores allow tremendous damage boost to gravity accelerators.
Better ferdonite utilization allow further amplification of gravity damage.
Lobs highly acidic shells to distant targets. Requires Tower Ammunition Factory to operate.
Research into Galatea 37 acidic biome creatures allow creation of tower analogues.
Reformulation of weaponised acidic fluids enable higher damage output of acidic towers.
Incorporation of nano-engineered palladium alloys enable more effective acid delivery to target.
Shoots a cooling beam to the target. Deals less damage than the standard Laser Tower.
Fires superheated liquid metal to target. Requires constant flow of ironium to operate.
Research into Rhodonite and Galatean creatures allow creation of sophisticated laser systems.
Development of better focusing technologies reduce diffraction at range and boosts damage output.
Newer Rhodonite-based components allow increased power and damage at range.
Triggers lightning strike on target. Requires substantial amount of power.
Research into rift technologies and Galatean aliens allow creation of special rift manipulation towers.
Application of rare minerals such as tanzanite allow more predictable triggers.
High performance quantum cores further enable greater control.
